hero_title: Financial education for children, oversight for parents
hero_sub: A modern, AI- and gamification-powered platform for families, retailers, and banks. Build your child's financial literacy, track spending, and instill smart money habits for the future.
feature_1_desc: Gamified financial literacy for children with a virtual experience that reflects real life.
feature_2_desc: Comprehensive monitoring for parents: limits, controls, and visibility into children's spending and goals.
feature_3_desc: Kids earn points and choose desired items in a virtual store. Parent approval required.
feature_4_desc: Aggregated, anonymized data on real demand and spending trends.
feature_5_desc: Badges, levels, motivational AI tips, and progress bars.
feature_6_desc: Data stored in localStorage for the demo; roadmap includes AES-256 encryption, 2FA, and banking integrations.
ai_1_desc: Motivational guidance for kids working toward goals; analytical tips for parents.
ai_2_desc: Real-time anonymized analytics and forecasting for retailers and banks.
ai_3_desc: Future: AI-powered transaction monitoring and fraud protection.
case_desc: Reduce unsold inventory, increase sales, and unlock actionable analytics for retail and banking partners. Demo charts and sample stats included.
cta_desc: Boost your child's financial literacy and manage your family experience on a modern, secure platform. Special partnership opportunities for retailers and banks!
